name: Struggle For Light
description: Struggle For Light is a top-down, local multiplayer, twin stick shooter with an old-school feel. With up to 4 players, pick up weapons and upgrades, dodge bullets, kill your friends and be the last one standing !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
